system.sustained:
Whilst Sustained all tests made with Psychic or Technological means to detect the character's presence, as well as anyone else within range, have -20. Means of detection that do not require a test must make a +10 Willpower if Psychic or +10 Intelligence if not technological or also fail to detect the psyker and those near them.
For every 5 Points above Threshold / 1 DoS on Focus Test, increase range by 10 metres.
